programme.title: Love's Portrait
programme.desc: Museum curator Lily finds a painting that's identical to her and searches for the artist in Ireland. While there, a charming man joins her on her quest and helps her rediscover love.

programme.desc: Two people find love in Ireland but their dreams drive them apart. Five years later, they reunite and the woman must decide where her heart belongs.
